name: Sticky Buddies!
description:
Sticky Buddies!

Practice the art of physical persuasion.

Touch your enemies, become buddies, use them to make more buddies and as meat shields! Don't get too comfortable though, the amount of buddies can be a real burden to your speed.

This game was made for 2022 Brackey game jam, held together by sheer willpower and C# duct tape.

Control:

WASD - Movement

Mouse - Look

Esc - Pause and open menu
